title: Punch press guarding
creator_contributor_role: Industrial Accident Prevention Associations, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Industrial accidents
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Safety
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Safety education, Industrial
description: Shows management and employees that there is a guard to protect workers on every type of punch press and that protection is provided only when the guard is properly adjusted. The punch press has a record of producing more permanent disability injuries than any other industrial mechanical equipment. Shocking accidents are shown followed by examples of guards available and a clear statement of the foreman's responsibility in preventing accidents.
